reviewText:
The movie is a well-written, poorly acted piece of softcore schlock.  Lorissa McComas and Tane McLure are the only saving grace...  both act their characters believably, but are trapped by poor direction and  supporting cast.
Not for the casual viewer, Lap Dancing is intended for  an adult audience intent on seeing naked women dance about and get  themselves into sexual situations.  The women are good-looking...  especially Lorissa, who is featured throughout the film as naked as  possible as often as can be explainable.  Definitely worth the money if  you're a fan of her's; and there's a good chance you'll find the movie  worthwhile if its not her you're specifically interested in looking at.  I  just want to know where I can find the soundtrack!
Waste of time.
Poor quality
Rough

This is what you get when you rip off Showgirls, which had itself ripped off All About Eve. Except Showgirls had better production values, better acting, a better script, and a better looking cast. But if you want to see a lot of nudity and be able to fast-forward through the clothed scenes without missing any important moments, this is the movie for you. By the way, I watched this on Amazon Prime which allowed me to see if the star, Lorissa McComas had made any other movies. Surprisingly, she has been in two others. Considering her acting ability, I would have thought one would have been enough.

This production (I hesitate to call it a "film")  is dumb,plotless and boring. As a 12yo  in the mid 60's I found the bra advertisements in a JC Penneys catalog far more intriguing  than this nonsense.

There is NOTHING authentic in this  mess- the breasts,the music,or the "dialogue".

You want strippers and lots of big boobies?  Bam...here's your flick. Unremarkable script but the cast really gives their best effort. Nice lighting and camera work; especially the strip club scenes. Lorissa McComas has sweet innocent face and a totally banging bod. Mike Sedan makes the most of a limited budget. Suprisingly well done.

Lorissa McComas, Tane McClure, and Kim Dawson some good names of mid 90's softcore video.  This video is bad because Lorissa can't act at all.  All three actress get naked and provide full frontal on occasion.  The sex scenes start ok with Lorissa but each one after the first gets weaker.  The ladies are lovely but this video should have been much better.

The dance scenes and the eroticism make this a good movie to watch.  I only wish the dance scenes had been edited a bit better.  Most of the transitional moves of the dancers have been chopped up or cut.  The acting is not that great, but I enjoyed the message of the movie which is to "let yourself go and feel the feelings!

The acting in this one is not that great and I wished the dance scenes had been filmed or edited better, but for me, it's the dance scenes and the eroticism that makes this a cute, light "date movie!" It'll get you hot with the opening shots alone!

This is an excellent stripper movie with the charming Lorissa McComas showing off er well endowed self.  A great exotic dance scene by Kim Dawson too. Unfortunately, in my opinion the film is marred by having the male lead played as a blind guy; a dumb gimmick.  Does he smell the girls as they do their routines or maybe he is turned on by the fine musical score. Catch the great fast editing in the dance numbers.  Some of the cuts must be about five frames a second

Regardless of the low budget and mediocre acting... this film is still pretty decent. Plenty of nudity for sure. Tame McClure is hot as usual and Lorissa McComas is cute and not a bad actress...

Note: Police ruled Larissa McComas death a suicide, but fingerprint evidence does not support that, as her prints were not on the gun or ammo that was used. The Fed's have audio recording confession of her husband at the time admitting he killed Lorissa. The Fed's will not release the tape to the police, nor will the police investigate the death as anything but a suicide. The whereabouts of the husband are unknown at last reading. Lorissa is another sad, tragic death by an abusive sicko!
